indicator_name: Concentrations of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) in England, 2011 to 2018
page_content: **Trend description**: Population-weighted annual mean concentrations of PM2.5 in England have declined from 12.1 ug/m3 in 2011 to 9.6 ug/m3 in 2019, a fall of 21% over the latest 8 years for which data are available.
graph_title: Concentrations of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) in England, 2011 to 2018
